detect_objects.description: Detects objects in an image based on a list of text prompts, calculates their centroids, and optionally saves the coordinates to a file.

inputs.name: prompt_list
inputs.description: A list of text prompts to identify objects for detection.

inputs.name: img_path
inputs.description: Path to the input image file.

inputs.name: save_path
inputs.description: Optional file path to save the detected centroid coordinates.

output.description: A list of (x, y) coordinates for the centroids of all detected objects.
